attributes.action: deport any immigrant & all dependants who commit a crime in UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Anyone who has been given the opportunity to live in UK as a UK resident should be instantly deported along with any dependants who they brought into the country if they commit ANY crime in the UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
